items.content_html: I18XS is a highly efficient, 3kb i18n solution for JavaScript and Node.js, suitable for performance-focused developers. Compatible with TypeScript and JavaScript, it's ideal for modern, lightweight applications, boasting ESM compatibility and powerful functionality despite its small size.

Compatible with TypeScript and JavaScript, it's ideal for modern, lightweight applications, boasting ESM compatibility and powerful functionality despite its small size.
